issue.title: [Packaging][RPM] Provide binary releases for CentOS Stream
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15916](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15916). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow 7.0.0 has not been released for Centos 8 since it reached its [EOL\|[https://www.centos.org/centos-linux-eol/]] (see also the discussion [here\|[https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/12602]).] Please consider providing binary releases for [Centos Stream](https://blog.centos.org/2020/12/future-is-centos-stream/) instead.
